## Funders

[![](https://www.vinnova.se/static/build/images/vinnova-complete-green.svg){fig-align="left" width="200px" style="margin-top: 0.5rem"}](https://www.vinnova.se)

Vinnova is Sweden's innovation agency. Our mission is to strengthen Sweden's innovative capacity and contribute to sustainable growth. We work to ensure that Sweden is an innovative force in a sustainable world.

[![](https://www.lusem.lu.se/static/toolkit/images/logo/logo_lusem@2x.png){fig-align="left" width="200px" style="margin-top: 0.5rem" fig-alt="Logo of Lund University School of Economics and Management"}](https://www.lusem.lu.se)

LUSEM is one of the worlds leading economics and management schools.
Located at the Lund University, Sweden.
